titles.title: A resolution designating September 17, 2003 as "Constitution Day".
A resolution designating September 17, 2003 as "Constitution Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 109.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 18, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates September 17, 2003, as Constitution Day.
